item.title: Bob the Drag Queen Sets Broadway Debut in ‘Moulin Rouge!’ as Harold Zidler
item.description: The ‘RuPaul’s Drag Race’ winner recently appeared in season three of ‘The Traitors,’ which notably just won five Emmys.
